Delete - Class in in.tosc.doandroidlib.objects
Represents HTTP Method - DELETE response handling

Delete(Boolean) - Constructor for class in.tosc.doandroidlib.objects.Delete
Parameterized Constructor
DigitalOcean - Class in in.tosc.doandroidlib
The main entry point for the Library First you need to initialise it using DigitalOcean.init(String clientId, String callbackUrl) (The clientId and callbackUrl are what you get when you register an app on Digital Oceal developer dashboard) You should use one of the following - Use the static DigitalOcean.doLogin(Activity) to login the user and get token Use the static DigitalOcean.getDOClient(String) to get a client
DigitalOcean() - Constructor for class in.tosc.doandroidlib.DigitalOcean
 
DigitalOceanClient - Interface in in.tosc.doandroidlib.api
Created by championswimmer on 26/11/16.
DigitalOceanStatisticsClient - Interface in in.tosc.doandroidlib.api
Created by championswimmer on 27/11/16.
doLogin(Activity) - Static method in class in.tosc.doandroidlib.DigitalOcean
This starts the login process (in a Chrome custom tab).
